name: Martin Kirov
title: Linux / Windows System Engineer
summary: Enthusiastic and hands-on system engineer who loves experimenting with computers and new technologies. Passionate about automation, trading automation, and the inner mechanics of blockchains. Comfortable building and defending systems against misconfiguration and exploits — curious, proactive, and calm under pressure.

highlights: Managed Windows-based infrastructure for a hotel complex (~80 users, multiple VLANs).
Configured and maintained AD DS, DNS, DHCP, GPO, and file/print services.
Monitored performance, handled updates, implemented security policies and backups.
Managed VLAN segmentation, VPN tunnels, and firewall logging under GDPR.
Designed multi-VLAN network with access levels (guest, admin, IP telephony, CCTV).
Integrated SALTO access control with electronic locks.
Managed DHCP/DNS, file servers, backup and monitoring systems.
Analyzed firewall logs and optimized performance (QoS, PoE, Wi-Fi).
Remote configuration and troubleshooting for Eero mesh networks.
Solved connectivity/stability issues for smart devices and home networks.
Kept documentation and CRM for tracking client interactions.
